definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: In the Most Holy Place he made a pair of sculptured cherubim and overlaid them with gold.
sentences.chinese: 在至圣所按造像的法子造两个基路伯，用金子包裹。

sentences.english: I'll try to find out who broken the window.
sentences.chinese: 我会想法子查出谁打破了那扇窗户。

sentences.english: Somebody gonna do something about the gophers.
sentences.chinese: 总得有人想法子对付地鼠。

sentences.english: And in the most holy house he made two cherubims of image work, and overlaid them with gold.
sentences.chinese: 在至圣所按造像的法子造两个基路伯，用金子包裹。

sentences.english: The traditional method, the computerization of the audit for the individual has not completely accounting.
sentences.chinese: 传统的查账法子，对电算化的会计个体已不完整适用。

sentences.english: A: Let’s just hope the politicians don’t figure out a way to spend it.
sentences.chinese: 让我们巴望政治家们不会想着法子把它用掉吧。

sentences.english: This trick also works with a geometric lantern or terrarium.
sentences.chinese: 同样的法子也适用于几何形的灯笼或玻璃容器。

sentences.english: "Sometimes the old ways are best," said Crowley.
sentences.chinese: “有时候还是老法子管用，”克鲁利说。

sentences.english: For the moment, she could scarcely forgive the substitution.
sentences.chinese: 这会儿，她没法子宽恕这种更替。

sentences.english: Every April Fool 's Day, Xiaoqiang would think of ways to trick others.
sentences.chinese: 小强每年愚人节都想着法子捉弄别人。

sentences.english: Yet he became very annoyed and resolved to find a means of avenging himself.
sentences.chinese: 可他又非常非常的恼怒，决定找个法子报仇雪恨。

sentences.english: The last time I caught him straying I used it on little Jake.
sentences.chinese: 最后一次抓到走失的小杰克时，我用了那个法子。

sentences.english: She is not able to take your call at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 她此刻没法子接你的电话。

sentences.english: Mr. Carter had no way to deal with it.
sentences.chinese: 卡特先生没有法子处理这事。

sentences.english: The best way to forget all your troubles is to wear tight shoes.
sentences.chinese: 忘掉你所有的烦恼的最好的法子是穿个小一号的鞋子。

sentences.english: He should, if possible, try to bring the ball further down the field.
sentences.chinese: 如果办得到的话，他应该想法子把球带得远些。

definition: to figure out/to work out (a solution etc)/to think up/to come up with (an idea etc)
move (in chess, on stage, in martial arts)/gambit/trick/scheme/movement/same as 著數|着数[zhao1 shu4]
a bright idea suddenly occurs (idiom); to hit upon an inspiration/to be struck by a brainwave
to try/to make an attempt/to think of a way (to accomplish sth)
as matters stand/things having reached this stage
to satisfy rival demands (idiom)/to get the best of both worlds/to have it both ways/to have one's cake and eat it too
